verses.verse: Listen <S%H8085><s%>, O <S%H339>isles<s%>, unto <S%H7181>me<s%>; and hearken, ye <S%H3816>peoples<s%>, from <S%H7350>far<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H7121>called<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb<s%>; from the <S%H4578>bowels<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%> hath he made <S%H2142>mention<s%> of my <S%H8034>name<s%>:

and he hath <S%H7760>made<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> like a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>; in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath he <S%H2244>hid<s%> <S%H7760>me<s%>: and he hath made me a <S%H1305>polished<s%> <S%H2671>shaft<s%>; in his <S%H827>quiver<s%> hath he kept me <S%H5641>close<s%>:
and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5650>me<s%>, Thou art my servant; <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, in whom I will be <S%H6286>glorified<s%>.

But I <S%H559>said<s%>, I have <S%H3021>labored<s%> in <S%H7385>vain<s%>, I have <S%H3615>spent<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> for <S%H8414>nought<s%> and <S%H1892>vanity<s%>; yet <S%H403>surely<s%> the <S%H4941>justice<s%> due to me is with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and my <S%H6468>recompense<s%> with my <S%H430>God<s%>.

And now <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that <S%H3335>formed<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to be his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, to <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3478>him<s%>, and that Israel be <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto <S%H3513>him<s%> (for I am honorable in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%> is become my <S%H5797>strength<s%>);

yea <S%H559><s%>, he saith, It is too light a <S%H7043>thing<s%> that thou shouldest be my <S%H5650>servant<s%> to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H5341>preserved<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for a <S%H216>light<s%> to the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>, that thou mayest be my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> unto the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>, to him whom <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H960>despiseth<s%>, to him whom the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H8581>abhorreth<s%>, to a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H4910>rulers<s%>: <S%H4428>Kings<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H6965>arise<s%>; <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and they shall <S%H7812>worship<s%>; because of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that is <S%H539>faithful<s%>, even the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who hath chosen <S%H977>thee<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, In an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> have I <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3117>thee<s%>, and in a day of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> have I <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5341>thee<s%>; and I will preserve <S%H5414>thee<s%>, and give thee for a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H6965>raise<s%> up the <S%H776>land<s%>, to make them <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5159>heritages<s%>:

saying <S%H559><s%> to them that are <S%H631>bound<s%>, Go <S%H3318>forth<s%>; to them that are in <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, <S%H1540>Show<s%> <S%H7462>yourselves<s%>. They shall feed in the <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and on all bare <S%H8205>heights<s%> shall be their <S%H4830>pasture<s%>.

They shall not <S%H7456>hunger<s%> nor <S%H6770>thirst<s%>; neither shall the <S%H8273>heat<s%> nor <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H7355>them<s%>: for he that hath mercy on them will <S%H5090>lead<s%> <S%H4002>them<s%>, even by springs of <S%H4325>water<s%> will he guide <S%H5095>them<s%>.
And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> all my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%>, and my <S%H4546>highways<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
Lo <S%H935><s%>, these shall come from <S%H7350>far<s%>; <S%H6828>and<s%>, lo, these from the north and from the <S%H3220>west<s%>; and these from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5515>Sinim<s%>.

Sing <S%H7442><s%>, O <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; and be <S%H1523>joyful<s%>, O <S%H776>earth<s%>; and break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing<s%>, O <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and will have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> upon his <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>.
But <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, and the Lord hath forgotten <S%H7911>me<s%>.

Can a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> her sucking <S%H5764>child<s%>, that she should not have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on the <S%H1121>son<s%> of her <S%H990>womb<s%>? <S%H7911>yea<s%>, these may forget, yet will not I forget <S%H7911>thee<s%>.
Behold <S%H2710><s%>, I have graven thee upon the palms of my <S%H3709>hands<s%>; thy <S%H2346>walls<s%> are continually before <S%H8548>me<s%>.
Thy <S%H1121>children<s%> make <S%H4116>haste<s%>; thy <S%H2040>destroyers<s%> and they that made thee <S%H2717>waste<s%> shall go forth from <S%H3318>thee<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%>: all these gather themselves <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2416>thee<s%>. As I live, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou shalt surely <S%H3847>clothe<s%> thee with them all as with an <S%H5716>ornament<s%>, and <S%H7194>gird<s%> thyself with <S%H3618>them<s%>, like a bride.

For <S%H2723><s%>, as for thy waste and thy desolate <S%H8074>places<s%>, and thy <S%H776>land<s%> that hath been <S%H2035>destroyed<s%>, surely now shalt thou be too <S%H3334>strait<s%> for the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%>, and they that swallowed thee <S%H1104>up<s%> shall be far <S%H7368>away<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H7923>bereavement<s%> shall yet <S%H559>say<s%> in thine <S%H241>ears<s%>, The <S%H4725>place<s%> is too <S%H6862>strait<s%> for <S%H5066>me<s%>; give <S%H4725>place<s%> to me that I may <S%H3427>dwell<s%>.

Then shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, Who hath <S%H3205>begotten<s%> me <S%H7921>these<s%>, seeing I have been bereaved of my children, and am <S%H1565>solitary<s%>, an <S%H1540>exile<s%>, and wandering to and <S%H5493>fro<s%>? and who hath brought <S%H1431>up<s%> <S%H7604>these<s%>? Behold, I was left <S%H375>alone<s%>; these, where were they?

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H5375>Behold<s%>, I will lift up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and set <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H5251>ensign<s%> to the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>; and they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> in their <S%H2684>bosom<s%>, and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> upon their <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>.

And <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall be thy nursing <S%H539>fathers<s%>, and their <S%H8282>queens<s%> thy nursing <S%H3243>mothers<s%>: they shall bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to thee with their <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of thy <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and they that <S%H6960>wait<s%> for me shall not be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>.
Shall the <S%H4455>prey<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, or the <S%H6662>lawful<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%> be <S%H4422>delivered<s%>?

But thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Even the <S%H7628>captives<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall be taken <S%H3947>away<s%>, and the <S%H4455>prey<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered<s%>; for I will <S%H7378>contend<s%> with him that <S%H3401>contendeth<s%> with <S%H3467>thee<s%>, and I will save thy <S%H1121>children<s%>.

And I will <S%H398>feed<s%> them that <S%H3238>oppress<s%> thee with their own <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; and they shall be <S%H7937>drunken<s%> with their own <S%H1818>blood<s%>, as with sweet <S%H6071>wine<s%>: and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, am thy <S%H3467>Saviour<s%>, and thy <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, the Mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
